name: interlinear
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
written or put between the lines of a text: The manuscript contains a number of interlinear comments. The poems are printed in a large font with generous interlinear spaces.
An interlinear book contains a version of the text in another language written between the lines of the main text: He is the editor of an interlinear Greek-English New Testament. They published an interlinear edition of Shakespeare's "Much Ado About Nothing".
More examplesFewer examplesShe had provided an interlinear English version of the original text.The book was published with an interlinear translation of the original Greek.This is the best interlinear Bible that you can get.
